title: MESMERISM AND QUANTUM TECHNIQUES / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Paret will explain the relationship between mesmerism and quantum techniques and will show you some non-verbal hypnosis demonstrations. He is the world's leading authority in non-verbal hypnosis and he's teaching the ancient traditions of Mesmerism and Fascination - the power of the gaze in modern times, to his students in his masterclasses all around the world. Watch the whole video, so you don't miss out on any of the non-verbal hypnosis secrets, that Dr. Paret is sharing. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
